iPhoto '11:
-------------------
The best way to view, organize and share your photos on the Mac

Enjoy new full-screen views to Faces, Places and Events.
Share photos with your friends on Facebook and read their comments directly to iPhoto.
Send photos by e-mail with stunning Apple-designed themes.
Choose one of the 12 tracks to slide shows and show off photos in full screen.
Books creates professional-quality photos even easier thanks to the improved delivery AutoCompose.
Sleek embossed printed cards for every occasion.

iMovie '11:
---------------------
Convert your home videos into blockbusters.

Make fun videos in true Hollywood style with a few simple clicks.
Create the perfect soundtrack with some simple audio editing controls.
Apply visual effects such as Slow Motion, Dream and many more with just one click.
Quickly find the clips you need with People Finder.
Give your videos a touch like TV news or sports broadcasts.
Post your film on Facebook, YouTube, Vimeo, CNN iReport, and others.

GarageBand '11:
----------------------
GarageBand has everything you need to create a great song.

Sets the tempo of your recording with Flex Time.
Equals the rate of all the tracks from a reference to the role Just like rhythm track.
Recreates the sound of legendary guitar pedals and with the new effects and amplifiers.
Learn to play the piano and guitar at your own pace, and see how you did with the provision How have I touched?

iWeb and iDVD:
----------------------
iLife '11 also features iWeb and iDVD to create websites express and burn your own DVDs.

----------------------
System requirements:
----------------------
Mac with Intel processor.
The provision of learning to play the GarageBand requires a Mac with Intel Core Duo processor or higher.
The video formats supported AVCHD camcorders requires a Mac with Intel Core Duo processor or higher. For more information, please visit Cameras compatible with iMovie '11.
1 GB of RAM.
About 5 GB of free hard disk space.
DVD drive for installation.
Monitor with minimum resolution of 1,280 by 768 pixels.
Mac OS X 10.6.3 or later.
To use the options on 24-bit recording in GarageBand you need to have a compatible audio interface with Mac OS X and 24-bit audio. Check the user manual or contact the manufacturer directly for information on specifications and compatibility of audio devices.
Some features and services of third parties require access to the Internet or MobileMe rates apply and conditions of service involved. MobileMe is available for over 13 years. It requires payment of an annual subscription and Internet access. Terms apply.
Printing services are available in some European countries and Asia Pacific as well as in the U.S.. UU., Canada and Japan.
Lessons GarageBand artists are sold separately and are available directly through the Shop Lessons in some countries.
Burning DVDs requires an Apple SuperDrive or other DVD recorder compatible third party.
Third party services may not be available in certain languages or countries. To use these services requires Internet connection, and you may need to accept other terms and conditions.
